articles.description: Infosys has signed tennis star Rafael Nadal as its brand ambassador. The company has entered into a three-year partnership with Nadal. Infosys has been the technology partner of the Association of Tennis Professionals (ATP) since the year 2015. The company is…
articles.content:

articles.title: 'Sachin Tendulkar Was The Highest Run-getter, We Keep Talking About One Six': Gautam Gambhir Blasts 'Hero W - News18
articles.description: Gautam Gambhir, who played a crucial 97-run knock final in the 2011 ODI WC final, pointed out the contributions of his teammates that didn't get noticed.
articles.content: Gautam Gambhir has again expressed his displeasure at the hero worship in Indian cricket. Gambhir, who played a vital role in Indias 2007 World Twenty20 and 2011 ODI World Cup triumphs, pointed out t… [+3231 chars]
